name: FAN POP RHYTHM STAGE〜Aim for the♡〜
name_original: FAN POP RHYTHM STAGE〜Aim for the♡〜
description:
Idol experience in VR!
A new action casual VR game where you can enjoy shooting x dancing with your favorite music!

Become an idol and liven up the stage!
Fun Pop Rhythm Stage ~Aim for the♡~" is a new type of idol experience action casual VR game where you become an idol and liven up the stage with fansa and dances.
The game is equipped with a function that reads your song data (mp3, wav, etc.) and automatically generates a music score, allowing you to play the game with your favorite songs.

In this game, the player alternates between the "shooting part" in which the player shoots fans who appear one after another during the live performance, and the "dancing part" in which the player dances to the music.

The "shooting part" is to shoot the hearts of the fans!
The "Shooting Part" is a shooting game in which you have to shoot out fans' fan fans.
There are three types of fansa: "Burn", "Peace", and "Heart".
Quickly identify and return the fansa to get evaluation points from the fans!


Dance and get the voltage up!
The "Dance Part" is a dance game in which you trace the notes that appear in the space.
The voltage gauge, which indicates the excitement of the audience, rises when you dance successfully!
The higher the voltage gauge is, the more bonus points will be added to the evaluation points in the shooting part.


Two theme songs are included!
In the "Play with Demo Songs" mode, you can play with two songs that are the theme songs of this work, "Hajimaru Ne☆" Karin ver. (CV. Reo Kurachi) and "Hajimaru Ne☆" Zakuro ver. (CV. Shun Abe)

Idol experience with your favorite songs!
This title is equipped with an "automatic music score generation function" that generates a music score by importing your own music data (MP3, WAV format).
Please enjoy this title by generating a music score with your favorite song.

Story.
The president of an office on the verge of bankruptcy discovered that you have a talent for fansa! and you are now set to make your idol debut.
With the support of your twin idols, Karin Seira and Zakuro Seira, you will struggle to win the hearts of your fans with your fansa and dance moves.

Navigation Character
Karin Hoshirai (CV. Reo Kurachi)
She is the most exciting idol in the office. She is the older twin sister of Pomegranate.
She loves to sing and calls herself the best idol of her generation.
When she learns that her office is in danger of going bankrupt, she is more eager than anyone else to nurture new idols,
She is a serious supporter of players who have a talent for fanzines.

Hoshirai Zakuro (CV. Shun Abe)
An idol popular with both men and women. He and Karin are twin sisters and younger brothers.
He is very athletic and learns dance choreography quickly.
He is serious in everything he does and often acts as a stopper for his older sister, who is always spinning her wheels.
He wants to avoid the bankruptcy of his office for his secret dream, so he expects a lot from his players.

Cautions
